languages.text: {n}Арджента в сердцах топает ногой и цедит сквозь зубы:{/n} "Как вам будет угодно. Преподобный Иеронимус! Я пойду... помолюсь в храме. Поговорим после, когда благородн{mf|ый|ая} {name} удалится".

{n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента в сердцах топает ногой и цедит сквозь зубы:{/n} "Как вам будет угодно. Преподобный Иеронимус! Я пойду... помолюсь в храме. Поговорим после, когда благородн{mf|ый|ая} {name} удалится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper and mutters through her teeth,{/n} "As you wish. Father Hieronimus! I must go... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."
{n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper and mutters through her teeth,{/n} "As you wish. Father Hieronimus! I must go... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

{n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest. "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

{n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest. "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

{n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔气急败坏地跺着脚。{/n}“如你所愿。”{n}她咬牙切齿地咕哝着，之后转向牧师。{/n}“希罗尼穆斯牧师，我必须先……去神殿里祈祷一下。等可敬的{name}离开之后，我们再谈谈吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔气急败坏地跺着脚。{/n}“如你所愿。”{n}她咬牙切齿地咕哝着，之后转向牧师。{/n}“希罗尼穆斯牧师，我必须先……去神殿里祈祷一下。等可敬的{name}离开之后，我们再谈谈吧。”

languages.text: {n}Argenta pisotea el suelo con ira.{/n} «Como desee», {n}murmura entre dientes antes de mirar al sacerdote.{/n} «Reverendo Hieronymus, tengo que irme... a rezar en el templo. Podremos hablar cuando {mf|el|la} noble {name} haya partido».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta pisotea el suelo con ira.{/n} «Como desee», {n}murmura entre dientes antes de mirar al sacerdote.{/n} «Reverendo Hieronymus, tengo que irme... a rezar en el templo. Podremos hablar cuando {mf|el|la} noble {name} haya partido».

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは腹を立てて地団太を踏む。{/n}「お心のままに」{n}彼女は歯を食いしばって呟き、司祭に向き直った。{/n}「ヒエロニムス司祭…寺院で祈りを捧げてきます。高貴なる{name}様が帰られた後で、もう一度お話ししましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは腹を立てて地団太を踏む。{/n}「お心のままに」{n}彼女は歯を食いしばって呟き、司祭に向き直った。{/n}「ヒエロニムス司祭…寺院で祈りを捧げてきます。高貴なる{name}様が帰られた後で、もう一度お話ししましょう」

languages.text: {n}Argenta stampft wütend mit dem Fuß auf.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht", {n}stößt sie aus ihren zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor und wendet sich dann dem Priester zu.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. Ich muss jetzt gehen und ... im Tempel beten. Wir reden, sobald {mf|der|die} edle {name} wieder abgereist ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta stampft wütend mit dem Fuß auf.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht", {n}stößt sie aus ihren zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor und wendet sich dann dem Priester zu.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. Ich muss jetzt gehen und ... im Tempel beten. Wir reden, sobald {mf|der|die} edle {name} wieder abgereist ist."

languages.text: {n}Argenta frappe du pied avec colère.{/n} « Très bien, {n}marmonne-t-elle les dents serrées avant de se tourner vers le prêtre.{/n} Révérend Hiéronymus. Je vais aller... prier au temple. Nous reparlerons lorsque {mf|le|la} noble {name} sera {mf|parti|partie}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta frappe du pied avec colère.{/n} « Très bien, {n}marmonne-t-elle les dents serrées avant de se tourner vers le prêtre.{/n} Révérend Hiéronymus. Je vais aller... prier au temple. Nous reparlerons lorsque {mf|le|la} noble {name} sera {mf|parti|partie}. »

languages.text: {n}Öfke nöbetine kapılan Argenta, ayağını yere vuruyor.{/n} "Nasıl istersen." {n}Sıktığı dişleri arasından mırıldanıyor, ardından rahibe dönüyor.{/n} "Muhterem Hieronymus, gidip... Tapınakta dua etmem gerek. Asil {name} gittikten sonra tekrar konuşalım."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta stomps her foot in a fit of temper.{/n} "As you wish," {n}she mutters through gritted teeth, before turning to the priest.{/n} "Reverend Hieronymus. I must go and... pray in the temple. We can talk once the noble {name} has departed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta öfkesini ayağını yere vurarak gösteriyor.{/n} "Nasıl istersen." {n}Sıktığı dişlerinin arasından söyleniyor, ardından rahibe dönüyor.{/n} "Muhterem Hieronymus, gidip tapınakta dua etmem gerek. Asil {name} ayrıldıktan sonra tekrar konuşalım."
